feed.title: Carla Perez-Martinez Research Laboratory
feed.subtitle: Fabrication with Ionic Liquid Ion Sources

entry.title: Invited Talk at Nanolithography Meeting
entry.content: Carla gave an invited talk at the 9th Spanish Nanolithography Meeting in Santa Pola, Spain, in October 2025.
entry.summary: Carla gave an invited talk at the 9th Spanish Nanolithography Meeting in Santa Pola, Spain, in October 2025.

entry.title: FABILIS presentations at the European FIB Network

link.title: FABILIS presentations at the European FIB Network

entry.content: Aydin gave a talk on “Optimisation of Charged Particle Optics with the Differential Algebra Method” and Shaun presented a poster on “Ion Implantation into Semiconductors using Ionic Liquid Ion Sources” at the meeting of the European FIB Network in Valencia, Spain, in September 2025. We had a great time and an epic paella.
entry.summary: Aydin gave a talk on “Optimisation of Charged Particle Optics with the Differential Algebra Method” and Shaun presented a poster on “Ion Implantation into Semiconductors using Ionic Liquid Ion Sources” at the meeting of the European FIB Network in Valencia, Spain, in September 2025. We had a great time and an epic paella.

entry.title: FABILIS talks at EIPBN
entry.content: Alex gave a talk on “Utilizing single species ionic liquid ion source beams for material irradiation,” and Carla gave an invited talk on “New approaches for charged particle optics for ionic liquid ion source” at the International Conference on Electron, Ion and Photon Beam Technology and Nanofabrication in Savannah, GA.
entry.summary: Alex gave a talk on “Utilizing single species ionic liquid ion source beams for material irradiation,” and Carla gave an invited talk on “New approaches for charged particle optics for ionic liquid ion source” at the International Conference on Electron, Ion and Photon Beam Technology and Nanofabrication in Savannah, GA.

entry.title: Early Career Award at EIPBN
entry.content: Carla was recognised with the 2025 Early Career Award of the International Conference on Electron, Ion, Photon Beam Technology and Nanofabrication in Savannah, GA.
entry.summary: Carla was recognised with the 2025 Early Career Award of the International Conference on Electron, Ion, Photon Beam Technology and Nanofabrication in Savannah, GA.
